sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Verizon Communications ( VZ ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.5%.
Year to date, Verizon Communications has not really moved.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 2.5%.
Home Depot is lower by about 4.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Nike ( NKE ), trading down 1.9%, and Coca-Cola ( KO ), trading up 0.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
